choices.B: in the Cisco Identity Services Engine
choices.D: dynamically on links between supported switches
choices.A: manually on links between supported switches
choices.E: in the Cisco Secure Access Control System
choices.F: in the global configuration of a TrustSec seed switch
choices.C: in the global configuration of a TrustSec non-seed switch

questions.question_text: Which two options are valid for configuring IEEE 802.1AE MACSec between switches in a TrustSec network? (Choose two.)

choices.D: the TCP dump diagnostic tool through the GUI
choices.C: output of show logging application profiler.log from the CLI
choices.E: the posture troubleshooting diagnostic tool through the GUI
choices.A: output of show interface gigabitEthernet 0 from the CLI
choices.B: output of debug logging all 7 from the CLI

questions.question_text:
Certain endpoints are missing DHCP profiling data.
Which option describes what can be used to determine if DHCP requests from clients are reaching Cisco ISE?
Which debug command on a Cisco WLC shows the reason that a client session was terminated?

discussion.content:
Debugs to Collect
debug client <client mac>—Gives information on how reauth related attributes, such as session-timeout and action-type, are applied.

debug aaa events enable—Helps to troubleshoot how different AAA servers are used for authentication, accounting, and authorization.

debug aaa packet enable—Helps to troubleshoot what different AAA attributes are received and applied.

questions.question_text: Which two Cisco Catalyst switch interface commands allow only a single voice device and a single data device to be connected to the IEEE 802.1X-enabled interface? (Choose two.)

comments.content:
Single-host - In single-host mode (see Figure 49-1 on page 49-2),
only one client can be connected to the 802.1X-enabled switch port. The switch detects the client by sending an EAPOL frame
when the port link state changes to the up state. If a client leaves or is replaced with another client, the switch changes the port
link state to down, and the port returns to the unauthorized state.
Single-host mode does not facilitate a voice domain port.

discussion.content:
Configuration Examples for IEEE 802.1X Multidomain
Authentication
Example: Configuring IEEE 802.1X Multidomain Authentication
The following example shows how to enable MDA and to allow both a host and a voice device on the port:
Device(config)interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
Device(config-if)# switchport access vlan 110
Device(config-if)# switchport voice vlan 110
Device(config-if)# no ip address
Device(config-if)# authentication host-mode multi-domain
Device(config-if)# authentication port-control auto
Device(config-if)# mab
Device(config-if)# dot1x pae authenticator
Device(config-if)# end

questions.question_text: Which RADIUS attribute is used primarily to differentiate an IEEE 802.1x request from a Cisco MAB request?

discussion.content:
Cisco NADs:
Service-Type=Framed ( an 802.1X authentication)
Service-Type=Login ( WebAuth)
Service-Type=Call-Check ( MAB)
